svg.text: LUNA–AEGIS SHORT HOPPER — SSSRA INTEGRATION DIAGRAM
VEHICLE: Single-stage VTOL Lunar Shuttle | Wet Mass: ~8,000 kg | ΔV: 1,800 m/s (+10% margin)
PROPULSION: LOX/LH₂ | Thrust: 25–30 kN | T/W: 1.9–2.3 (lunar liftoff) | ISP: 370–450 s
CREW: 4 standard (2–6 modular) | RANGE: 1,500–2,000 km | DURATION: 72–96 hr crewed
SSSRA: PV array shades flat-plate radiator from direct solar flux → consistent thermal rejection regardless of heading or sun angle
Aegis Station Infrastructure LLC — aegisstation.com — engage@aegisstation.com
